title: Life Natural - Antimicrobial peppermint oil for natural odor control
description: Natural alternative treatment to fight odor causing bacteria for apparel, footwear and home textiles.
cleaned_text: Unlike conventional odor control treatments that use heavy metals and synthetic chemicals, we use natural peppermint oil to control odor-causing bacteria. Life Natural's peppermint oil is a sustainable and renewable odor control treatment with no negative environmental impact as compared to heavy metal based antimicrobials. As Odor Control Innovators, we bring extensive depth and experience to our brand and manufacturing partners that resonates with consumers and complies with regulatory requirements.
